description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Le Périgord illustré, guide monumental, statistique, pittoresque et historique de La Dordogne, etc. [With illustrations.]" Author: AUDIERNE, François Georges. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10173.d.16." Page: 457 Place of Publishing: Périgueux Date of Publishing: 1851 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000139824 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
